ai-patthana23.28:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.28:1.1_0: And I don’t give rise to the teaching from material unskillful phenomena to arise because of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.28:2.1_0: ‘I don’t give rise to the teaching from material unskillful phenomena to arise because of material delights.
ai-patthana23.28:3.1_0: not declared by the cause or condition for material pleasures.
